title: Snowman Cannon
summaries: The Snowman Cannon is a Hardmode, post-Plantera launcher. It has a low chance (4.4% â€“ 7.52%) to be dropped by the Ice Queen during the Frost Moon event. It can be considered an upgraded, homing version of the Rocket Launcher, firing rockets that will track the nearest enemy and detonate on contact.
